Posts.Content: Sep 25, 2010 03:01PM catlover6294 wrote: That is great that you got such AWSOME news.  I do hope I get the same.  It is so hard to try to stay calm through all of this.  I have NEVER been through anything like this.  I have always been a perfect picture of health.  What is my biggest concern is that it the surgeon said that it does not really feel like a lump, just more fullness.  She did mention trauma, but then said i am sure you would remember that.
Posts.Title: Very Very Nervous catlover6294 catlover6294
